thread.title: Railroads Embark on Apology Tour to Make Amends for Hunter Harrison’s Ways

author: David George-Cosh
title: Railroads Embark on Apology Tour to Make Amends for Hunter Harrison’s Ways
text:
TORONTO—Two big railroads are reaching out to customers upset by the late Hunter Harrison, a hard-nosed turnaround expert who led both companies during a five-decade career.

Canadian Pacific Railway Ltd. is turning to a charm offensive to woo back customers, a key part of its strategy after Mr. Harrison stepped down in January 2017 and went on to run Jacksonville, Fla.-based CSX Corp.
